name: Toxic Drive
description:
Description : You must drive your car as far as possible. Be careful, the brakes are broken and a dangerous toxic liquid sea is below you ...

Controls : left/right arrows to turn

Each road section is randomly selected from a pre-made list.

This game was created alone in 3 hours for the TriJam#118 and the theme was toxicity. I used Unity and every asset was created during jam time.
